PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-15512000-10-040,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisRequest to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to report on the earliest possible establishment of over-the-air television services that reflect and meet the needs of the multicultural and multiracial population of the GREATER VANCOUVER AREA, and to submit its report to the Governor in Council no later than February 28, 2001.
Attachments
